title: About Me — Machine Learning is Fun!
content: Your Custom Text Here I'm a software developer with over 15 years of professional experience building large systems and managing development teams for companies like Groupon. I've worked on website infrastructure, mobile apps and all sorts of other stuff, but these days I focus on consulting and writing. I truly believe that machine learning is going to be a large part of the future of software development and it's important for every developer to have a basic literacy of machine learning techniques. You can contact me by email and on Twitter or check out my personal website.
